mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( id, password, company_nm, ceo_nm, business_num, company_phone_num, role, fax_num, addr1, addr2, manager_nm, manager_num, email1, email2, email3, file_id, income_message, credit_amount, special_message, maker, warehouse, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, "0000", #{companyNm}, #{ceoNm}, #{businessNum}, #{companyPhoneNum}, #{role}, #{faxNum}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{managerNm}, #{managerNum}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{email3}, #{fileId}, #{incomeMessage}, #{creditAmount}, #{specialMessage}, #{maker}, #{warehouse}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id}, company_nm = #{companyNm}, ceo_nm = #{ceoNm}, business_num = #{businessNum}, company_phone_num = #{companyPhoneNum}, role = #{role}, fax_num= #{faxNum}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, manager_nm = #{managerNm}, manager_num = #{managerNum}, email1 = #{email1}, email2 = #{email2}, email3 = #{email3}, file_id = #{fileId}, income_message = #{incomeMessage}, credit_amount = #{creditAmount}, special_message = #{specialMessage}, maker = #{maker}, warehouse = #{warehouse}, reg_date = now()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, CONCAT(EMAIL1,'@',EMAIL2) as EMAIL_1, CONCAT(EMAIL1,'@',EMAIL3) as EMAIL_2 FROM MEMBER) I WHERE (I.ID = #{id} AND I.PASSWORD = #{password}) OR (I.EMAIL_1 = #{id} AND I.PASSWORD = #{password}) OR (I.EMAIL_2 = #{id} AND I.PASSWORD = #{password})

SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
